mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT (CH_NO, CH_MESSAGE, CH_SENDER, CH_TARGET) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(CH_NO)+1, '1') FROM CHAT), #{ch_message}, #{ch_sender}, #{ch_target})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, e1.EMPL_NAME sender_name, e2.EMPL_NAME target_name FROM CHAT c JOIN EMPLOYEE e1 ON c.CH_SENDER = e1.EMPL_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON c.CH_TARGET = e2.EMPL_ID WHERE (CH_SENDER = #{ch_sender} AND CH_TARGET = #{ch_target}) OR (CH_SENDER = #{ch_target} AND CH_TARGET = #{ch_sender}) ORDER BY c.CH_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT SET CH_SET = 'N' WHERE CH_TARGET = #{ch_target}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT c WHERE CH_TARGET = #{ch_target} AND CH_SET = 'Y'
